docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 17 (AP) -- A new South American haven for refugee money from any place in the world has been created in Uruguay under protection of a recently passed investment law.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 17 (AP) -- A new South American haven for refugee money from any place in the world has been created in Uruguay under protection of a recently passed investment law.
docs.abstract: New law allowing free movement of investment capital discussed; small tax set

headline.main: URUGUAY MOVING TO DRAW CAPITAL; Enacts Law for Free Ingress and Egress of Investment Funds -- No Action Yet

docs.snippet: Two Netherlands steamship companies announced here yesterday the formation of a new shipping line to enter the highly competitive service between New York and east coast ports of South America.
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Netherlands steamship companies announced here yesterday the formation of a new shipping line to enter the highly competitive service between New York and east coast ports of South America.
docs.abstract: Formed by Holland-America Line and Goudriaan SS Co; execs comment

headline.main: NEW LINE TO ENTER LATIN AMERICA RUN; Van Nievelt, Goudriaan and Holland-America Plan First Sailing Here Dec. 8

docs.snippet: PARIS, Oct. 20 -- A French proposal to give the United Nations the right to intercede in future cases of mass murders of populations only when such acts of wholesale killings are sanctioned by States raised a series of strong protests here today.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, Oct. 20 -- A French proposal to give the United Nations the right to intercede in future cases of mass murders of populations only when such acts of wholesale killings are sanctioned by States raised a series of strong protests here today.
docs.abstract: UN com opposes French proposal that UN intercede only when govts commit crime; urges convenant make responsible individuals and nonofficial groups; some reprs back USSR move to exclude pol groups from conv

headline.main: MOVE TO CURB U.N. ON GENOCIDE IS HIT; French Proposal to Bar Right to Intercede in Individual Murders Scored

docs.snippet: A parcel of 180 lots in the Rosewood tract at Bayside, Queens, has been sold by Realty Associates, Inc., according to H.D. Burchell, vice president, to Lana Homes, Inc., builders. The new owners plan to improve the property with one-family dwellings.
docs.lead_paragraph: A parcel of 180 lots in the Rosewood tract at Bayside, Queens, has been sold by Realty Associates, Inc., according to H.D. Burchell, vice president, to Lana Homes, Inc., builders. The new owners plan to improve the property with one-family dwellings.

headline.main: 180 BAYSIDE LOTS TAKEN BY BUILDERS; Part of Rosewood Tract to Be Improved With Dwellings -- Home Sales in Queens

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 23 -- In the face of the unimproved dollar situation, President Juan D. Peron's regime has tightened controls on credit operations and exchange allowances with a view to curbing domestic inflation and slowing the exodus of what few...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 23 -- In the face of the unimproved dollar situation, President Juan D. Peron's regime has tightened controls on credit operations and exchange allowances with a view to curbing domestic inflation and slowing the exodus of what few dollars have heretofore been available.
docs.abstract: Natl Econ Council orders banks to halt 'speculative' loans; cuts grants to banks for rediscount purposes; lifts rediscount rate

headline.main: PERON TIGHTENS CREDIT CONTROLS; Argentines Ordered to List Their Gold -- Exchange for Travel Is Banned

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO Chile, Oct 26 (UP) -- Representatives of banks and stock exchanges in the United States and five South American countries met today in the second Inter-American Congress of Stock Exchanges. The first was held in New York last year.
